body: Our NBA Model has your exclusive **NBA Playoff Predictions** populating all year. So you can see the chance of your team making the playoffs, to winning the chip. Each week you'll see East and West tables on: * Chances of making the playoffs * Having the best regular season record in their conference * Finishing with the league's best record * Making the Finals * Winning the Title Convert those percentages into odds and you can find some great betting opportunities. - - - ## **NBA Playoff Predictions - Eastern Conference** ![nba playoff predictions east](/images/uploads/nba-playoff-predictions-8-feb-east.png "nba playoff predictions east") - - - ## **NBA Playoff Predictions - Western Conference** ![nba playoff predictions west](/images/uploads/nba-playoff-predictions-8-feb-west.png "nba playoff predictions west") - - - ## **NBA Futures Interpretation** Back the Jazz. Do it now. Brooklyn are still grossly under the odds. And the Model ain't buying Philly. Are they right or wrong? - - - ## **More NBA Resources** We LOVE betting futures. Get our predictions before the year, as well as our quarterly updates: * **[NBA Rookie Of The Year](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-rookie-of-the-year/)**[](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-mvp-odds/) * **[NBA MVP](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-mvp-odds/)** * [](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-mvp-odds/)**[NBA Championship Odds & Picks](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-championship-odds/)** * **[NBA Power Rankings](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-power-rankings)** - - - ### **Want more insight? Get the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ###
title: Your 2021 NBA Playoff Predictions (Updated Weekly)
